navBarItems.demoDescription: A proof of concept collection of OSVR tools and functionality.
navBarItems.devicesDescription: Contains a list of connected and disconnected devices and available devices.
navBarItems.pluginsDescription: Contains a list OSVR plugins that are installed on the system and available to download/purchase
navBarItems.settingsDescription: Configuration page for users to adjust global OSVR settings
navBarItems.helpDescription: A help page to get in touch with support team, open documentation, and collect system information

jumboTron.title: Sensics Tray
jumboTron.description: This utility will help you configure Sensics Home.

landingPage.copyright: Sensics Tray is Copyright 2016 Sensics, Inc.

serverRootNotDefined.panelTitle: Could not find your OSVR Server directory.
serverRootNotDefined.panelDescription: Could not find the OSVR Server directory. Typically this is configured when you run the OSVR SDK or Runtime installers, but can be configured manually by setting the OSVR_SERVER_ROOT environment variable.

startServer.title: Launch OSVR Server
startServer.description: Launch the OSVR Server on this machine, if not already running.

trackerViewer.title: Tracker Viewer
trackerViewer.description: The Tracker Viewer utility visualizes OSVR trackers and can be useful to check if an OSVR device is working properly.
trackerViewer.pathPlaceholder: OSVR path to track (leave blank to track head and hands). Enter multiple paths with a space between each.

startDeviceMonitor.title: Start Monitoring USB Devices
startDeviceMonitor.description: Will start the service to monitor USB Device events

openDocs.title: OSVR Documentation
openDocs.description: Opens a new page with OSVR documentation

createSysReport.title: Create System Report
createSysReport.description: Collects system information and saves it to a file
